website_summaries.verdict: The Vionic Bryant was considered reasonably priced for its quality build and comfort. Its arch support also helped to relieve foot pains. Commenters were also pleased that it was easy to put on and remove. Though there were claims that the fit and length were as expected, a few purchasers noted that the trainer ran short and narrow. It was also not as comfortable for some buyers because of chafing and poor cushioning. But in the end, most buyers ended up being delighted with their purchase.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers appreciated the comfort delivered by the Vionic Bryant
A majority of the owners liked the arch support on this model with some stating that it relieved their foot pain
The length and width of the trainer were deemed perfect by numerous wearers
Several testers enjoyed the fact that this footgear was easy to put on and remove
Because of the quality build of the shoe, some shoppers thought it was worth the price
A few folks enjoyed how lightweight this model felt on their feet
cons: A minority of consumers ranted that the Vionic Bryant ran short and narrow
The underfoot cushioning and arch support were deemed insufficient by several users
A couple of individuals complained that the back of the shoe chafed their hindfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband has plantar fascitis and these really support his feet. He was wearing sketchers and they could be folded up which meant there was little to no support. The Vionic shoes feel great and give plenty of support. My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rbeez

customer_reviews.title: Gross, nasty, previously owned shoes
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I could tell that these shoes had been previously returned. When I removed the footbeds, there was a scaly, oily skinned foot imprint, on both shoe footbeds. Obviously the previous owner had worn them for quite some time and barefoot. Doesn't say very much for the quality control of returned items. It's a shame too, because I really liked these shoes. I'll be returning them, but am leery about reordering another pair, for fear I will get some more of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Highest arches I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.text: These things had ridiculously high arches. They hurt the moment I put them on. I tried very hard to walk around for a few minutes but it was excruciating. The soles were also quite hard. Not at all like described. For someone with high arches, perhaps they might work but I feel they were not as advertised and they didn’t help and actually made my pain worse.
customer_reviews.author: Sage B

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as indoor only shoes /slippers and they are great. Often I'm on my feet for many hours a day and my plantar fasciitis doesn't flare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my husband’s plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, fit great and are very comfortable! My husband has been struggling with plantar fasciitis for a few months and finally found some relief with Vionics. These shoes are really nice looking and the price is so much better than the local store that carries them. Such a great find! He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: DENICE P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate- if your feet hurt but these!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear Vionic shoes so I decided to buy A pair for My husbands achy feet & legs. He’s had them several months now & loves wearing them. He says they’re the most comfortable shoes he has & Very supportive. I actually just ordered another pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pairs
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first pair so much I bought a second to use for lawn & garden work. Great foot support. Vionic shoes have helped with my plantar fasciitis over the last couple years. These are priced right and are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: YoBro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Got this shoe after reading reviews and much searching for a good, sturdy, walking shoe. Very comfy right out of the box. Ordering another pair now!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Russ

customer_reviews.title: Right for you?
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is designed to give side support, so is noticeably restrictive or intentionally intensely supportive thru the sides. Might be perfect for someone who needs or wants that kind of design.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter 2

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are much like Birkenstock’s in that your feet must adapt to the foot bed. So the first several times you wear them do it for a short period of time. I Wear mine around in the house until my foot becomes accustom to them. Once you have they will be your best friend. Definitely will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes ever. They even cured my head ache and receding hairline the first day I put them on. I went to the lake the other day and I was able to walk on water with these shoes. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Pearlina B.

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a shoe that provides good arch support and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Nisenholz

customer_reviews.title: Vonic makes great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Vonic fan and have converted my husband - the arch support in their shoes is fantastic and the fit is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Rysa

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: My wife told me about this brand and I am so glad she did. These shoes fit more like a glove than a shoe. They look great and fit even better. I will be buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Allen

customer_reviews.title: Plantar fasciitis friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and have been wearing Vioic for about 6 months. They all work great but I really like these being slip on. They fit great and have the same support as other Vionics.
customer_reviews.author: William Evans

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Its been very difficult to find nice shoes with great arch support. Loved them so much that bought another pair on a different color. Only issue is that they are not breathable enough for my super sweaty feet, but they are so comfortable that I can forget about that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE! GREAT STYLE ! AND UNBELIEVABLY COMFORTABLE-------NOT just for. Your feet
customer_reviews.text: Love it entirely! Fit comfort, it is a little pricey, worth it! EVerything is just so expensive these days!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Reese

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was too tight on jus at the top of my heal and gave me a blister
customer_reviews.author: steven goldman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes if you have plantar fasciitis. Helped to relieve pain quite a bit. Fit is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bukh

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get used to the arch but feel like the fit and comfort is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took away foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, extremely comfortable and took away my plantars faciaitis pain. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking comfortable slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He likes that they slip on easily & are very comfortable. True to size. As with all Vionic shoes, nice arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Danna V

customer_reviews.title: Husband sells another pair of vionics....
customer_reviews.text: Now I can’t stop my husband from telling all his friends about his vionics...fit, comfort, walking, standing, and would be jumping if he wasn’t 73!! YES HE’S SOLD. Oh you need more tennis shoe colors he is a shoe addict
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Arch support is great. Shoe fits great. My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Golden

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shoes. They are very comfy. Went on a long weekend trip. I brought along another pair of shoes just incase my feet got tired in these, but I didn't need the spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Baker

customer_reviews.title: too small.
customer_reviews.text: order a size bigger. good shoes, just too tight for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are not broken in yet. Can't add a headline
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking shoes in. So far they are very comfortable and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Problem with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The top where the side is sewn to the top has become unsewn and has come apart. I bought these shoes mid March 2019. Could I return the shoes and receive a replacement. My husband likes these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alert!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a mans size 8! Its a womans!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and look good. Bought a second pair in both colors as the price is terrific
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Suprizing comfort.
customer_reviews.text: So very comfortable that you forget you have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lessans

customer_reviews.title: Good support and casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes to wear around with good support or add soles
customer_reviews.author: Kosta Makrodimitris

customer_reviews.title: At first a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice casual "slip-on". I'm still in the process of breaking them in. A bit narrow at first fit but am assuming with a bit more wear they will stretch a bit. Great arch support for my collapsed left arch, I wear Vionic sandals as well, really make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Anderson

product_meta.title: Vionic Fulton Bryant Greige Men's Trainer
product_meta.description: The VIONIC® Bryant is the ideal sneaker for enjoying the great outdoors. Soft suede upper. Easy slip-on style features twin gore panels for a comfortable fit. Pull tab at the ankle. Soft textile lining for all-day wear. Removable mesh EVA insole for optimal comfort. The podiatrist-designed Orthaheel Technology provides superior orthotic support, relief, and stability which helps realign the feet back to their natural position. Durable rubber outsole for a pleasurable walking experience. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Biomechanically designed to hug your arches
Vionic brings together style and science, combining innovative biomechanics with the most coveted trends.
